subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Carli Lloyd’s goal on a leaping header in the 51st minute gave the Americans a jolt of confidence as they advanced to the semifinals, where they will face Germany.
snippet: Carli Lloyd’s goal on a leaping header in the 51st minute gave the Americans a jolt of confidence as they advanced to the semifinals, where they will face Germany.
